scripts.generate: TS_POST_PROCESS_FILE='npx prettier --write' openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.json -g typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=true --additional-properties=useSingleRequestParameter=true --additional-properties=withSeparateModelsAndApi=true --additional-properties=modelPackage=models --additional-properties=apiPackage=api --enable-post-process-file
